faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about SCLight Exchange

items.question: What is a cryptocurrency exchange?
items.answer: A cryptocurrency exchange is a digital marketplace where traders can buy, sell, and exchange cryptocurrencies. SCLight Exchange is the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, offering spot trading, futures, staking, and more.

items.question: What products does SCLight Exchange provide?
items.answer: SCLight Exchange offers a comprehensive suite of products including Spot Trading, Futures Trading, Margin Trading, Savings & Staking, NFT Marketplace, SCLight Exchange Pay, SCLight Exchange Card, and educational resources through SCLight Exchange Academy.

items.question: How to buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies on SCLight Exchange
items.answer: You can buy crypto on SCLight Exchange using credit/debit cards, bank transfers, P2P trading, or third-party payment channels. Simply create an account, complete verification, deposit funds, and start trading.

items.question: How to track cryptocurrency prices
items.answer: SCLight Exchange provides real-time price tracking through our website and mobile app. You can view live charts, set price alerts, analyze market trends, and access historical data for all listed cryptocurrencies.

items.question: How to trade cryptocurrencies on SCLight Exchange
items.answer: After funding your account, navigate to the trading interface, select your trading pair, choose between market or limit orders, enter your amount, and execute the trade. We offer spot, margin, and futures trading options.

items.question: How to earn from crypto on SCLight Exchange
items.answer: SCLight Exchange offers multiple earning opportunities: Flexible Savings (earn interest on idle assets), Locked Staking (higher APY for locked periods), Launchpool (farm new tokens), and Liquidity Farming.

mobileApp.description: Download the SCLight Exchange app and access your portfolio, trade crypto, and manage your account from anywhere in the world.

faqList.question: What is P2P exchange?
faqList.answer: P2P stands for peer-to-peer, and P2P exchanges are platforms that allow users to buy and sell crypto for fiat currency directly with other users.

faqList.question: How do I buy Bitcoin locally on SC-LITE P2P?
faqList.answer: After you complete identity verification and add your payment methods, you are ready to buy crypto on SC-LITE P2P platform. First, choose from all the available offers in the marketplace. Second, place an order to buy your crypto, and pay the seller based on the preferred payment methods. Lastly, get your crypto from the seller after you complete the fiat transaction and confirm your payment on SC-LITE P2P.

trade1.question: How do I place my first trade?
trade1.answer: To place your first trade, navigate to the trading interface, select your desired trading pair, choose between Market or Limit order, enter the amount you want to trade, and click Buy or Sell. Always review your order details before confirming.

trade2.question: What is the difference between Market and Limit orders?
trade2.answer: A Market order executes immediately at the current market price. A Limit order allows you to set a specific price at which you want to buy or sell, and will only execute when the market reaches that price.

security1.question: How do I enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)?
security1.answer: Go to Account Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. Download an authenticator app like Google Authenticator, scan the QR code, and enter the 6-digit code to complete the setup. Always save your backup codes in a secure location.

security2.question: What should I do if I suspect unauthorized access?
security2.answer: Immediately change your password, enable 2FA if not already active, review your login history and active sessions, and contact our support team. We recommend withdrawing funds to a secure wallet if you suspect a breach.

deposit1.question: How long do deposits take to process?
deposit1.answer: Crypto deposits typically require network confirmations and can take 10-60 minutes depending on the blockchain. Bank transfers may take 1-5 business days. You can track your deposit status in the transaction history.

deposit2.question: Are there withdrawal limits?
deposit2.answer: Withdrawal limits depend on your verification level. Basic accounts have a 2 BTC daily limit, while fully verified accounts can withdraw up to 100 BTC daily. View your limits in Account Settings.

account1.question: How do I verify my account?
account1.answer: Complete account verification by providing a government-issued ID, proof of address, and a selfie. Go to Account > Verification and follow the step-by-step process. Verification typically takes 24-48 hours.

account2.question: Can I have multiple accounts?
account2.answer: No, each user is allowed only one account per platform. Multiple accounts may result in suspension. If you need to change account details, contact support for assistance.

Users can easily buy, sell and trade crypto directly with other users, while setting their preferred prices and payment methods in an open crypto marketplace.

beginner.question: What is P2P exchange?
beginner.answer: P2P exchange is a marketplace where users trade cryptocurrencies directly with each other without intermediaries.

beginner.question: How do I sell Bitcoin locally on SC-Lite P2P?
beginner.answer: Go to P2P page â†’ Select Sell â†’ Choose Bitcoin â†’ Enter amount â†’ Select payment method â†’ Confirm order â†’ Wait for payment â†’ Release Bitcoin.

beginner.question: Which cryptocurrencies are supported in the P2P trade zone?
beginner.answer: BTC, ETH, USDT, BUSD, BNB and many other popular tokens. Availability varies by region.

beginner.question: How to add new payment methods on SC-Lite P2P?
How do I buy Bitcoin locally on SC-Lite P2P?
beginner.answer: Navigate to P2P â†’ Click Buy â†’ Select Bitcoin â†’ Browse offers â†’ Enter amount â†’ Make payment â†’ Mark complete â†’ Wait for release.

beginner.question: Why is SC-Lite P2P better than other P2P marketplaces?
beginner.answer: Zero fees, fast transactions, escrow protection, multiple payment methods, 24/7 support, large user base, multi-language support.

beginner.question: How do I protect myself against fraud? SC-Lite P2P Escrow FTW!
beginner.answer: Use escrow protection, verify payments carefully, check user ratings, communicate via chat, report suspicious activity, never trade outside platform.

advanced.question: How to set up price formulas for P2P ads?
advanced.answer: Use percentage-based formulas above/below market price or fixed prices with dynamic adjustments for automated pricing.

advanced.question: What are the trading limits on SC-Lite P2P?
advanced.answer: Limits vary by verification level and payment method. Complete KYC to increase your trading limits.

advanced.question: How to manage multiple payment methods?
advanced.answer: Add and verify multiple payment methods in settings. Enable/disable them per ad for flexibility.

advanced.question: Understanding P2P order appeal process
advanced.answer: If issues arise, open an appeal within the order window. Provide evidence and our team will review and resolve.

advanced.question: How to filter and block users?
advanced.answer: Use the block feature to prevent specific users from seeing or trading with your ads.

advanced.question: Setting up automatic replies for P2P orders
advanced.answer: Configure auto-reply messages to inform buyers about your payment process and requirements.

advertisers.question: How do I become a P2P merchant?
advertisers.answer: Complete KYC verification, maintain good trading volume and completion rate. Apply via merchant application page.

advertisers.question: What are the benefits of being a merchant?
advertisers.answer: Higher visibility, ability to create ads, merchant support access, higher trading volumes and profit potential.

advertisers.question: How to create effective P2P advertisements?
advertisers.answer: Set competitive prices, offer multiple payment methods, write clear terms, maintain high completion rates.

advertisers.question: Managing ad visibility and positioning
advertisers.answer: Keep ads active, maintain fast response times, complete trades quickly to improve your ad ranking.

advertisers.question: Understanding merchant fees and commissions
advertisers.answer: Review the fee structure for merchants. Zero trading fees apply, but understand payment processing costs.

advertisers.question: How to handle high-volume P2P trading?
advertisers.answer: Use multiple payment accounts, set appropriate limits, maintain sufficient crypto balance, monitor orders regularly.

questions.question: What Is Spot Grid Trading and How Does it Work
questions.answer: Grid trading is a type of quantitative trading strategy. This trading bot automates buying and selling on spot trading. It is designed to place orders in the market at preset intervals within a configured price range. Read more in our FAQ

questions.question: How to Create a Spot Grid Trading Strategy on SC-Lite
questions.answer: To create a Spot Grid Trading strategy, navigate to the Trading Bots section, select Spot Grid, configure your parameters including price range, number of grids, and investment amount, then activate the bot.

questions.question: How to Use Spot Grid Trading Auto Parameters
questions.answer: Auto Parameters feature automatically suggests optimal settings based on market conditions. Simply select the Auto Parameters option when setting up your grid bot, and the system will recommend price ranges and grid quantities.

questions.question: SC-Lite Spot Grid Trading Parameters
questions.answer: Key parameters include upper and lower price limits, number of grids, investment amount, and arithmetic or geometric progression. These settings determine how your bot will execute trades within the specified range.

questions.question: How to use the Strategy Trading Landing Page
questions.answer: The Strategy Trading Landing Page provides an overview of all available trading bots, performance metrics, and quick access to create or manage your strategies. Navigate through different bot types and view detailed analytics.

questions.question: What Is Futures Grid Trading
questions.answer: Futures Grid Trading is similar to Spot Grid but operates on futures markets with leverage. It allows you to trade with borrowed funds and can profit from both rising and falling markets.

questions.question: What Is Long/Short Grid Trading
questions.answer: Long/Short Grid Trading enables you to set directional bias. Long Grid profits from upward trends, Short Grid profits from downward trends, while Neutral Grid works in ranging markets.

questions.question: Futures Grid Trading Auto Parameters Guide
questions.answer: Auto Parameters for Futures Grid considers volatility, leverage, and market trends to suggest optimal settings. It helps reduce risk while maximizing potential returns based on current market conditions.

questions.question: How to Use TWAP Algorithm on SC-Lite Futures
questions.answer: Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) algorithm splits large orders into smaller chunks executed over time, reducing market impact and achieving better average prices for your trades.

questions.question: How to Use Volume Participation Algorithm on SC-Lite Future
questions.answer: Volume Participation algorithm executes orders based on market volume patterns, ensuring your trades blend with natural market flow and minimize price impact.

questions.question: Strategy Trading Disclaimers
questions.answer: Trading bots carry risks including market volatility, technical failures, and potential losses. Past performance doesn't guarantee future results. Always understand the risks and invest responsibly.

questions.question: What Is Rebalancing Bot and Frequently Asked Questions
questions.answer: Rebalancing Bot automatically adjusts your portfolio allocation to maintain target percentages. It helps manage risk and optimize returns by periodically rebalancing your crypto holdings.

questions.question: What are Algorithmic Orders? TWAP and POV Strategies Explained
questions.answer: Algorithmic orders use advanced execution strategies like TWAP (Time-Weighted Average Price) and POV (Percentage of Volume) to optimize trade execution, reduce slippage, and minimize market impact.

apiConnectivity.title: Trading Connectivity
apiConnectivity.description: We offer access to Spot, Margin, Futures, and Options API trading for over 300 digital and fiat currencies. API trading provides a testing environment, API documentation, and sample code in multiple programming languages. Suitable for all your trading needs.

developers.title: Made for Developers
developers.description: Facing a problem in development? Find help from the developer community. We would like to hear from you! Share your thoughts with us.

questions.question: How to create API key?
questions.answer: To create an API key, log in to your SC-Lite account, navigate to API Management in your account settings, and click 'Create API'. Follow the security prompts to generate your key. Make sure to save your secret key securely as it will only be shown once.

questions.question: Is there an API Documentation?
questions.answer: Yes, comprehensive API documentation is available on our developer portal. It includes detailed endpoint descriptions, request/response examples, authentication guides, and code samples in multiple programming languages to help you integrate quickly.

questions.question: Does SC-Lite provide a Testing or Demo environment?
questions.answer: Yes, SC-Lite provides a testnet environment where you can test your API integrations without using real funds. The testnet mirrors the production environment's functionality, allowing you to develop and debug your applications safely before going live.

questions.question: Can I use other languages(such as Python or Java) with SC-Lite API?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our API is RESTful and language-agnostic. You can use any programming language that supports HTTP requests. We provide official SDKs and code examples for popular languages including Python, Java, JavaScript, C#, and more on our GitHub repository.

questions.question: Where can I find more information?
questions.answer: You can find more information in our comprehensive documentation portal, developer community forum, and official blog. For technical support, join our developer Telegram group or submit a ticket through our support center. We also regularly host webinars and publish tutorials on our YouTube channel.

items.question: How do I get started with Sclight?
items.answer: Simply sign up for a free account, complete the verification process, and you can start trading within minutes. No minimum deposit required.

items.question: What are the trading fees?
items.answer: We offer competitive fees starting at 0.1% per trade. Volume-based discounts are available for active traders.

items.question: Is my money safe on Sclight?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-grade security, cold storage for 95% of funds, and maintain a $100M insurance fund.

items.question: Can I trade on mobile?
items.answer: Yes! Our mobile apps for iOS and Android offer the full trading experience with a seamless interface.
